DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Observational Study Define HBsAg Loss With Without Seroconversion antiHBs Patients With Chronic Hepatitis B Virus Treated With Nucleoside/Nucleotide Analogs
DOC.criteria: > 18 year old Chronic hepatitis B ( HBeAg+ HBeAg ) HBsAg loss Treated nucleoside/nucleotide analogue With without previous interferon ( IFN/PEGIFN ) Patients HBsAg loss 2006 Immunocompetent patient Spontaneous HBsAg loss HBsAg loss treatment monotherapy combinated IFN PEGIFN .
